alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 9:24PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf and southern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Liberty and Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 1015 PM EST/915 PM CST/... At 924 PM EST/824 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Stonemill Creek to 10 miles northeast of Port St. Joe to 35 miles south of Mexico Beach. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Franklin, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Abe Springs, Royal Bluff, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, St George Island St Pk, Central City and Cape San Blas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
